Text.val: generates a SOAP request fro Tamino to obtain the number of pages
11-FEB-2004 on AS/400 we do for some reason not get HTTPHEADER information
The check for getPageCountResponse in HTTP header SOAPAction (error#7) is
-- path for temp. data, output, templates, ...
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
read URL for SOAP request from .ini ....
read xml into blob and post to Tamino SOAP adapter ....
since we have it stored in a blob we do not need the XML file anymore
11-FEB-2004 AS disabled check for SOAPAction HTTP header because we do - for
some reason - not get HTTP header information when running on the AS/400
